text: Ani tya lokanni, allahaca jasa sanmana karayala pahije hota tasa kela nahi. Samasta dharati, kayamatacya divasi tyacya muthita asela ani sampurna akasa tyacya ujavya hatata gundalalele asela to motha pavitra ani ati ucca ahe, tya pratyeka vastu (va gosti) pasuna jila loka tyaca sahabhagi tharavitata
